title: Amazon5555 Fire 2222TV Stick 4K [2024 Version]
body_html:
Key Features

The next generation of our most popular 4K streaming stick
Upgrade your 4K streaming experience with Fire TV Stick 4Kânow powered by a quad-core 1.7 GHz processor for faster app starts and more fluid navigation. It makes getting to the good stuff even easierâall for an affordable price.

An ultra-cinematic 4K experience
From preliminary finals to premieres, experience it all like you're there with support for cinematic 4K Ultra HD. Experience vivid colour and brightness with support for Dolby Vision and HDR10+, immersive sound with Dolby Atmos, and smooth streaming with Wi-Fi 6.

Enjoy smooth 4K streaming in your home
Amazon's most popular streaming stick in the world now supports Wi-Fi 6 for smooth 4K streaming, with less interference from other connected devices. To use Wi-Fi 6, youâll need a compatible router like the eero 6+. If you have a Wi-Fi 6E router, we recommend Fire TV Stick 4K Max. Fire TV Stick 4K works with earlier Wi-Fi routers, too.

Next level gaming. No console required
No matter what kind of gaming youâre into, Fire TV has you covered. Play games like you stream movies with Xbox Game Pass. Now you can stream hundreds of high-quality games with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate directly on your Amazon Fire TV Stick 4K. No console required. Play new games on day one, plus dive into legendary franchises from Fallout to Halo, and everything in between with Game Pass Ultimate. Just grab your favourite, compatible controller and download the Xbox app to start playing.

Find what to watch with Alexa
Press and hold the voice button and ask Alexa to take you to your favourite shows. Not sure what to watch? You can search by genre.

âAlexa, find action movies.â

Stream free movies, shows, and clips
Power on and start watching a world of free entertainment through ad-supported streaming apps like 9Now, 7plus, ABC iview, 10Play, SBS On Demand, YouTube and more. You can access over 125,000 movies and TV episodes without paying for subscriptions.

From smart home controls to smart living
Control compatible smart home devices right from your TV. You can press and ask Alexa to do things like show Live View Picture-in-Picture camera feeds without interrupting your show, check the weather, and stream music. And Fire TV is always getting smarter with new Alexa Skills and voice functionality.

Alexa Voice Remote with TV controls
Just press and ask Alexa to find, launch, and control content. Quickly get to favourite apps with preset buttons, and go beyond streaming to check sports scores and play music. Dedicated power and volume buttons control your compatible TV, soundbar, and receiver.

keyFeatures: Performance: Quad-core 1.7 GHz processor with Wi-Fi 6
Quality: Cinematic 4K Ultra HD with Dolby Vision and Atmos
Smart stuff: Alexa Voice Remote with smart home controls

Surge and Overload Protection

On-Board Master Switch

Handy Slide Out Hanger

Australian Business & Support

Current: 10A (Max.)

title: Sonos Sub Mini222 (Black)
body_html:
More exhilarating home theatre
Unlock your entertainment experience when you pair Sub Mini with Beam or Ray. The 5 GHz WiFi connection enhances audio transmission speed so you can enjoy films, shows, and games with high-quality sound reliably synced with your TV.

More mesmerising music
Never miss a beat and hear more nuance in every note when you pair Sub Mini with One or One SL.

Core power
Within the acoustically-sealed cabinet, dual custom woofers generate the full-toned low frequencies of a much larger subwoofer. Advanced processing further enhances the bass response.

No buzz or rattle
Both woofers face inwards to create a force-cancelling effect that neutralises distortion.

Better bass for your space
Trueplayâ¢ tuning technology adapts the bass for the unique acoustics of the room so it never sounds harsh, muddy, or flat â even if you place Sub Mini next to the wall.

Hides in plain sight
Elegant and compact, Sub Mini blends in beside your furniture and easily fits under a desk or table.

Connects wirelessly
Sub Mini connects to your system over WiFi, so you can place it wherever it fits and looks best in the room.

Plug, add, play
Just plug in the power cable, open the app, and follow a few simple instructions to add Sub Mini to your system.

Easy control
The volume automatically adjusts along with your paired soundbar or speaker. Use the Sonos app to customise the EQ and change the bass level to your preference.

Specifications

Amplifiers: 2 x Class-D digital amplifiers are perfectly tuned to the unique acoustic architecture.
Woofers: Dual 6" woofers face inwards for a force-cancelling effect.
Architecture: Sealed cabinet neutralises distortion and enhances bass response.
Frequency Response: As low as 25 Hz
EQ: Audio settings automatically equalise to balance Sub Mini and the paired Sonos product(s). Use the Sonos app to adjust bass, treble, and loudness.
Trueplay: This software measures the acoustics of the room then fine-tunes your Sonos system. Supported iOS device required.
WiFi: Connect to WiFi with any 802.11a/b/g/n 2.4 or 5 GHz broadcast-capable router.
Ethernet: 10/100 port for hardwiring to your router
Voltage: 100-240V 50/60Hz internal power supply
Operating Temperature: 0Â°C to 40Â°C
System Requirements
WiFi: Internet connection
Power Source: Nearby electrical outlet
Sonos app: The latest generation of the Sonos app running on a compatible device
Dimensions (DxH)mm: 230 x 305
Weight: 6.35kg

keyFeatures: Sound configuration: Feel immersed with surprisingly rich and balanced low end
Connections: WiFi or ethernet connection
Enhanced feature: Class D amplifier
WiFi or ethernet connection

title: Philips 555NeoPix 120 Projector
body_html:
The NeoPix 120 lets you enjoy a comfortable True HD 720p image in unmatched quietness. Display all your content with the wide range of connectivity (HDMI, USB) and connect your Apple TV, Amazon Fire Stick, laptops and even your smartphones! Customizing your image is so easy: the NeoPix 120 uses digital zoom, manual focus as well as keystone correction technology to deliver a 16:9 image, even at different angles and in different environments. Connect your USB stick or hard drive to play movies, photos and even music with the integrated multimedia player. With comfortable image comes great sound! The powerful 2.1 audio system with bass boost gives you the best sound wherever you are.

Key Features

True HD 720p resolution with up to 65" image size

Built-in Multimedia Player and HDMI in

Powerful 2.1 Sound System

LED light source with super quiet operation

keyFeatures: Screen: 720p HD resolution image up to 65" LCD projector system
Brightness: 100 Lumens of brightness and up to 30,000 hours light source life
Enhanced feature: Can use USB stick or hard drive via the built-in media player

title: Sony Bravia Camera
body_html:
Connect the Sony BRAVIA CAM to your BRAVIA XR TV and enjoy television like never before. BRAVIA CAM recognizes where you are in the room and how far you are from the TV, then adjusts sound and picture settings so they're just right. This means audio - including dialog - is clearer and more immersive with picture brightness tailored to your viewing environment.1,2

Every picture, optimized to your position in the room
Detecting the distance between you and your TV, BRAVIA CAM adjusts TV brightness, so youâll always enjoy perfect picture quality, no matter where you are in the room. A light and colour sensor in the TV optimizes pictures to light conditions for the best possible viewing experience.1,2

The ideal sound experience from anywhere
BRAVIA CAM follows you and your position, even if you are watching from the sides, then adjusts left and right sound balance for optimum acoustics. Wherever you are in the room, you'll enjoy the same sound quality as if you're sitting right in front of the TV.1,2

Hear voices clearly, no matter where you are
By detecting your viewing distance, BRAVIA CAM is able to adjust voice zoom automatically so you can hear dialog clearly. The volume of TV dialog increases when you move away from the TV and decreases when you get closer.1,2

Enjoy video chat with friends and family on the big screen
Catch up with your friends and family, on the big screen. Enjoy more fun by connecting your TV with BRAVIA CAM.

Easy to connect, easy to close
Attaching and detaching the supplied BRAVIA CAM to your BRAVIA TV is quick and easy. Use the camera cover switch on top of BRAVIA CAM to close the camera cover if you want more privacy at any time.

Key Features

Compatible with select 2022 Sony TVs â A95K / A90K / A80K / X95K / X90K / X85K / X80K

Enjoy video chat with friends and family on the big screen

Ambient Optimisation Pro recognises where youâre sitting in the room and automatically optimises picture and sound according to the room environment

Experience a new way to control your TV with Gesture Control. Change channels, adjust volume, and more simply by using gestures â no remote required


1 This feature is available on BRAVIA XR TVs â X90K, X95K, A80K, A90K, A95K, Z95K.
2 Other than video chat, other BRAVIA CAM features will be available via future firmware update.

keyFeatures: Type: Sony BRAVIA CAM for your BRAVIA XR TV
Compatibility: Select 2022 Sony TVs, including A95K / A90K / A80K / X95K
Design: Ambient Optimisation Pro auto-adjusts picture and sound

title: Hisense HS2100 2.1 Channel Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer [2023]
body_html:
The Hisense HS2100 2.1CH Soundbar comes equipped with a wireless 5.25â³ Subwoofer and is the perfect addition to your home entertainment setup. This Hisense Soundbar takes the audio quality of content you love to the next level. Whether youâre watching sports, movies, playing video games or listening to music, youâll be fully immersed in exquisite sound quality. Wherever you are in the room, the Dolby Digital Audio Technology delivers crisp sound with brightness and clarity. With convenient connection methods including Optical, HDMI, Bluetooth, Aux, and USB, you can install the HS2100 quickly and easily to enjoy premium audio quality in a matter of minutes.

2.1 Channel Speakers
2 speakers and a wireless subwoofer that boasts a whopping 240 watts of power and superior audio performance powered by Dolby Audio Technology.

Loud Deep Bass
Wireless 5.25â³ front firing subwoofer adds more depth to the sound bringing movies, TV and music to life with rich, powerful bass.

DTS Virtual X
Delivers powerful and immersive surround sound in any room.

Multiple EQ Modes
With AI EQ technology, let the soundbar optimise every scene for the perfect listening experience.

EzPlay*
When paired with a compatible Hisense TV, EzPlay enables you to conveniently use your Hisense TV remote to control this Soundbar.

Multiple Connections
With HDMI OUT (ARC), the Hisense HS2100 Soundbar is easy to install and connect to your TV wirelessly through Bluetooth or using a single HDMI cable.

Key Features

Sound configuration: 2.1 Channel 240W soundbar with wireless subwoofer

Connections: HDMI ARC, USB, AUX & Optical connection points and Bluetooth v5.3

Enhanced feature: AI EQ technology optimises the listening experience

6 Tailored sound modes - Movie, Night, Sports Music News and Game modes

DTS Virtual:X immersive surround sound

*Features may not be compatible with all Hisense TVs. Functions may vary by TV model. Only compatible Hisense TV remote can control TV & soundbar.
